effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A kick with a high critical- hit ratio. May cause a burn.
flavor_text.emerald: A kick with a high critical- hit ratio. May cause a burn.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A fiery kick with a high critical-hit ratio. It may also burn the foe.
